title.narrative: Nepal Urban Governance and Infrastructure Project

activity-date.narrative: Actual start date of the activity
Planned end date of the activity
Actual end date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA

condition.narrative: The Recipient shall carry out the Project in accordance with the Implementation Arrangements set out in Section I, Schedule 2 tothe Financing Agreement.

title.narrative: Participating Municipalities receive annual Urban Development Grant (UDG) allocations in a timely manner after verification of Grant Access Conditions (GACs)
Average annual UDG utilization rate of participating municipalities for financing strategic municipal infrastructure projects
People provided with improved urban living conditions
Number of strategic municipal infrastructure subprojects planned and executed reflecting citizen and service delivery needs
People provided with improved urban living conditions - Female (RMS requirement)
Person-days of temporary work provided under Labor Intensive Public Works
Number of municipalities compliant with GACs to access UDGs
Institutional strengthening plans developed, implemented and reported on, in line with the methodology
Dedicated team in MoUD established and fully functional for project implementation and management
Contingent Emergency Response Operations Manual developed and adopted
Number of strategic and climate resilient infrastructure sub-projects identified and designed in line with project design
Number of people participated in stakeholder consultations for subproject design and implementation
Dedicated implementation teams in municipalities established and fully functional for project implementation and management
Total length of safety assessed municipal roads rehabilitated under the project, in compliance with climate/disaster-resilient design standards
Number of Women's Empowerment Plans developed and funded in participating municipalities
Proportion of participating municipalities with grievance redressal and active anti-harassment cells (%)
Amount of UDGs accessed by municipalities for strategic municipal infrastructure project
Number of municipalities with strengthened financial management and procurement systems
